title: Help needed!
content:
There has been a few crashes reported for these 2 scenarios:
  - At the beginning of color replace.
  - When openning a file.
Based on the crash logs, I was not able to find the root cause to fix them. If you have encountered crashes in any of the above situations, please shoot me an email at info@pixqaure.art or join the Discord server and let me know.
I really appreciate your help to make Pixquare better.

Thank you
Son Nguyen.
